title: Wilshire 5000 Total Market Full Cap Index
notes:
The observations for the Wilshire 5000 Total Market Full Cap Index represent the daily index value at market close. The market typically closes at 4 PM ET, except for holidays when it sometimes closes early.

The total market indexes are total market returns, which do include reinvested dividends. The designation Full Cap for an index signifies a float adjusted market capitalization that includes shares of stock not considered available to "ordinary" investors.
